strings.Value: "Why does everyone look even more miserable than usual?"
"You're quiet today. In case you're wondering, that wasn't a complaint."
"It is so cold, so damp... Why did we decide to camp here?"
"It smells like a troll's armpit here. What the hell is that â€” did {name} take off {mf|his|her} boots, or is there a rotting corpse nearby..."
"Don't gloat. You know full well how such an environment affects the party's morale."
"Hmm? You think so? I thought our companions were enjoying the spirit of this place..."
